name: Traffic Dispatcher
description: Make sure the traffic flows smoothly and that the vehicles do not crash into each other.

name: Master of the Wizards
description: Master of the Wizards is a party card game about powerful Wizards battling, flinging spells and curses at each other, conquering and destroying lands along the way. Play with up to 5 other friends. Each match is very unpredictable, but with a bit of strategy and planning, you can turn the tables.

name: The New Chronicles of Noah's Ark
description: Help Noah in this Match3 game to build a great ark capable of housing two of each kind of animal, in order to save them and bring them safely through the flood. It will be a tremendous task, one that sounds impossible to complete.

name: Battleships: Command of the Sea
description: Take on the role of one of the historical commanders of the US or Japanese navy and use their special skills inspired by their character or military accomplishments.

name: Halftime Heroes
description: Halftime Heroes is a Survival Rogue Action RPG game with short and intense matches where you learn spells, level up, acquire loot and fight bosses. Each time you die you may upgrade or unlock several features.

name: Paranormal Motel
description: Cindy is a receptionist at the Paradise Motel. She begins her night watch. She takes care of customer requests as usual. But that evening unforeseen events will terrify Cindy

name: Floor is Water
description: Platformer, where player controls white ball. The main feature of the ball is its jumping ability, the main enemy is water. The ball cannot fight water, so it makes the most of its jumping ability and tries to jump away from the water as far as possible.

name: Battery-out
description: Battery-out is an action platformer with power routing.

name: GoodNight
description: A psychological horror game about a girl named Veronica who experiences intense paranormal activities after her family's tragic death in a fire.

name: Re:Bf
description: When a world is overwhelmed by new monsters, it's up to a single apprentice adventurer to set out on a quest and bring peace back to the land in this JRPG with fully animated combat!

name: Conflict 3048
description: Real-time strategy and tactics on an alien world! Command super space soldiers against an array of alien hordes. Commander - we need you!

name: Combatant
description: In Combatant you will live a story with lots of bullets and destruction, controlling Alfie. You can play in first person or third person, and you'll have several weapons to help you in the main objective, besides, of course, a special ability that can be used by the protagonist.

name: Truco
description: A fun card game where you must use your skills to win.

name: Nekoglai Simulator
description: Help Nekoglai to become the most popular streamer! To achieve that goal you need to collect gnomes, gold and keys.

name: Splinters of Regret
description: Splinters of Regret is an action, bullet hell game where you fight manifestations of regrets. Using the power of Splintering, make your way through the land of regrets to escape.

name: Codemakers
description: Why are you here? what is going on? how did this happen? all will be answered in due time. until then, you must rebuild what is left of this universe, by harvesting code from the simulator and saving people and places. will you rebuild, or will you fall just like the last iteration?

name: Mission Twentyeight
description: Your country has been captured and alongside other rebels you sabotage the enemy forces in order to aid your military in taking back your land.

name: The Renovator: Origins
description: We play as the son of a restorer, a museum worker who died tragically. While searching for the memorabilia, the door suddenly closes and strange things begin to happen. The hero is waiting for immersion in the world of art and the paranormal.

name: Chester
description: After a tragic accident, you find yourself fighting your worst fears. With your best friend Chester at your side, you'll face down what lurks in the dark.

name: I Am 1
description: You start as 1 single pixel, But that's no fun! As you progress, the game evolves into a 2D side-scrolling action adventure! FIGHT through your foes, level up and upgrade to become more than just 1!

name: Secrets of the Temple
description: Secrets of the Temple is a single player puzzle platformer adventure game. Traverse the Pharaoh's labyrinthian temple and locate and collect the Eye of Ra before it's too late!

name: Legends of Mathmatica 2: Under the Shadow of Certainty
description: Legends of Mathmatica²: Under the Shadow of Certainty is a humorous retro style JRPG, featuring a 16-bit aesthetic, an active time battle system, old school puzzle dungeons, and a comedic storyline that is filled with word play and genre savvy silliness.

name: Nea Edem
description: Explore a ruined city and shoot your way to the truth of the past in the first ever 3D game from the creator of the Lloyd the Monkey series.

name: Crash Test Idiot
description: You must destroy every car in the city.

name: Red Yet Capers: Math vs Mayhem
description: Red Yet Capers is a mix of mathematics, and fun-filled running, jumping, shooting, and ducking. For ages 8 and up.

name: Neon Sundown
description: Neon Sundown is a unique roguelite shooter that mixes card-building with fast-paced action. Build your deck using a variety of unique playing cards, collect various resources to unlock different power modules, and take on several diverse arenas.

name: Coloring Pixels: Platformers
description: Platformers BookThis Platformers themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! The book celebrates the Game Genre of Platformers, visit many game worlds in this brand new addition to Coloring Pixels!

name: Planet Collectors: Episode Earth
description: Planet Collectors: Episode Earth is an intense fps shooter game with as much as possible realistic feeling to it. Your goal is collecting enough credits to escape from the map. It is a multiplayer game with 6 players maximum and you can work with other players or betray them, that is up to you.

name: Travelers in Space Crack
description: Travelers in Space Crack is a survive game in deep space. Explore in different galaxy through space cracks. To find and gather useful resource, to trade and make money are all important to develop your own fleets. And only through build massive fleets, you triumph over the unknown evil forces.

name: Dungeon Explorer
description: Dungeon explorer - A brave knight goes to a dangerous dungeon after he heard that the ancient evil has awakened again and is trying to break through to the surface .. Stop the hordes of opponents and their master before it's too late, the fate of the world is in your hands!

name: Ghost College: Hotel Fright - Chapter 1
description: The strange death of a roommate, the sudden "friendly" Mr. Wang, as well as the out-of-place hotel, so that the ghost college has new clues, as well as a new mystery, has been chasing the female ghost, what is hidden behind, with the passage of time, everything is gradually clear

name: Rolling Balls
description: This is a physics-based ball racing game where you compete against your friends in Coop-Mode or if you choose to play alone there is an option to race against Time in the Singleplayer-Mode.

name: Prototype Blocks 2
description: Prototype Blocks 2 - Continuation of the first part of the puzzle in which new difficulties and portals await you!

name: Re: Survivor
description: Sin descripción

name: Empire of Sin: Make It Count
description: Make It Count is the first major expansion for Empire of Sin, adding a new playable boss: Maxim Zelnick, the “Mob’s Fixer.” Zelnick brings a string of ways to expand your empire, including the Fixer gangster profession, Loan Shark racket, additional missions, weapons, events, and much more.

name: Cage-Face: Case 2 - The Sewer
description: Find your way out of the sewers while fighting off an unstoppable monster and slowly succumbing to a mysterious illness.

name: Anima
description: Immerse yourself in the world of Anima, a powerful entity with magical powers. Help Anima in her quest to obtain freedom from the prison she's been trapped by her own kind.

name: Learning Life: Mysteeri 24/7
description: Mysteeri 24/7 is an immersive escape game for vocational rehabilitation and youth work. The game is a single-player game with linear gameplay. The game is well suited for all professionals who work with young people, for example in vocational rehabilitation, vocational education and youth work.

name: Dwarven: Mining Dungeons
description: Mining in a team up to four players in various every round changing Dungeons for gold and precious ores. But beware to be to loud. Enemies could lurk around every corner...

name: Survive
description: SURVIVE is a 6 player multiplayer horror game. Survive a killer in different environments, accomplish objectives and call the police to escape.

name: Red Solstice 2: Survivors - Condatis Group
description: Experience a new story line with new and old characters and settings. Take on the role as Marshal and survive by any means.

name: Bassmaster Fishing 2022: Lake Hartwell
description: Get ready to take on the monster Lake Hartwell and the most professional bass fishing tournament – The Bassmaster Classic. It’s time to go head-to-head with the competition and compete in a 3-round final on the Bassmaster 2022 Classic venue to become the champion and take home the coveted trophy.

name: Pusher
description: Pusher is a box-world or sokoban type game. Fight your way through a mixture of 50 levels, ever increasing in difficulty. The goal of the game is to push boxes around until they are all in the designated positions, but this is easier said than done.

name: Short Circuit
description: Unique PvP flying arena fighter set around macro electronics

name: Grand Theft Rome
description: Lead roman, greek, chinese, egyptian, or knights into battle against other factions. Win by giving specific commands like box, circle lined formations and fighting alongside your troops in this ancient battle simulator.

name: Red Hero Adventure
description: Red Hero Adventure is an adventure about a red ball in the arcade genre. Go through exciting puzzle levels, playing as the most bouncy hero! You will have to climb narrow ledges with high accuracy, jump over littered islands and dodge sharp spikes.

name: The Sinking Structure, Clione, and Lost Child: Log-1
description: Two silent wanderers,6 full chapters,A game of exploration and adventure.

name: Ortharion: The Last Battle
description: The Mage Ortharion has chosen you for The Last Battle! Make the right choices as you explore a world filled with magic and secrets. Improve your character in multiple ways and manage an adventurer's guild.

name: Claire's Cruisin' Cafe: High Seas Cuisine
description: Feed the famished masses on a luxury cruise through tropical waters! With a chef's knife in your hand and the warm sun on your back, you'll prep everything from mouthwatering meatballs to succulent sushi as you satisfy the gourmet cravings of the passengers on a grand ocean liner!

name: Brothers
description: Take care of your family! A family is under threat from a group of people, help them find a safe place, go through chases, create ways to escape the danger, and see the end of this story.

name: Skyward
description: Build against the oncoming storm in an island hopping, rune collecting, roguelite citybuilder!

One day, the boy is suddenly caught up in an incident and is forced to face problems he has been avoiding, giving him an opportunity to think about himself. And the boy comes up with a solution on his own. What choice did the boy make?

name: GoKart: New Mexico
description: Start your engines and prepare for the ultimate driving experience. Compete against the clock or up to 3 of your friends, choosing from a diverse set of stunning and challenging tracks.

name: VR Sweet Heart
description: VR Sweet Heart This is an immersive VR game, completely designed for VR experience. In the game, players can play as a tourist traveling in Japan and discover a trusted custom shop.

name: SudoKube
description: An enhanced sudoku experience, 6 times more fun

name: Cursed
description: A horrific retro point and click adventure with combat

name: Tanks, But No Tanks
description: Tanks, But No Tanks is an updated take on a classic top-down arena tank shooter. This multiplayer madhouse will keep you on your toes as you balance collecting coins on each map with shooting projectiles at your foes. Upgrade your tank's weapons, armor, and abilities in between rounds with the coins you pick up.

name: Inertia
description: You're stranded in space in an asteroid field. Use your ship to smash through fuel-rich asteroids for points and fuel, and use any power-ups you find along the way. But remember, an empty fuel tank is just as deadly as an asteroid. The void of space is a tough place to be, but you can't stop now.

name: Smashball
description: Smashball is a SciFi Sports game with some minor RPG features to add immersion. Take on the challenge to become one of the planets leading athletes, celebrated by thousands of hysterical fans. Soar through the air, dodging opponents in order to score goals and bring glory to your fanbase.

name: Voice of Chernobyl
description: Voice of Chernobyl is a Multiplayer First-Person Shooter in a chaotic world! with different variety of maps, intense battles and over 50 weapons!

name: Christine
description: Christine is a young orphan who works at the Paris Opera, with an unexplored talent for singing. If history sometimes repeats itself, will an Angel of Music help her to achieve her dreams?

name: Master Chess Ultimate
description:
Play your favorite chess game in a classical setting of Master Chess!

Play with a friend or against computer's artificial intelligence, choosing from three difficulty levels.

name: Farm Manager 2022
description:
In Farm Manager 2022 you will find even more plant species to grow. Now also organic ones! Grow celery, carrots, currants, gooseberries, onions and more. Observe plant growth. The new mechanics allow automatic field management using available employees and machines.
Enjoy a variety of machines that you can use when working in the field. Buy and sell them on the stock market. Look for bargains among used machines. You will find bees, sheep, goats, chickens, turkeys, ducks, geese and cows. For the first time, you will be able to set up a fish farm, ostrich, wild boar and quail farm.

Logistics center, mechanic's garage, veterinary center and much more! The logistics center will allow you to transport larger quantities of resources and products easier and faster. In the mechanic’s garage, they will take care of your agricultural machinery. Employees from the veterinary center will ensure the health of your farm

name: Radiometric Dating
description: A visual novel/dating simulator where you can date rocks! You play as a geology student who gets transported to a magical world during field camp. Meet handsome princes and navigate through magic encounters to find a way home!

name: Aracnidium
description: Earth has been invaded by android spiders. Bob's family is in danger. Spiders are getting into houses from all sides. Find the right angle and shoot the spiders. Help Bob in this mission.

name: Push the Sheep
description: A puzzle game where you have to push the sheep to make each one graze.

name: Scorpion Overdrive
description: Scorpion Overdrive is a fast paced, third person shooter, combined with tower defense style turrets and weapon placements. Enemies spawn in furious hordes as you gun them down and strategically place turrets and traps to help cover you and your equipment.

name: Ball Pain
description: Ball Pain is next in line to join the ranks of Rage Games. Can you get to the top before you start raging?

name: Sudocats
description: Sudoku for cat people. Cats are wonderful creatures but you better not put them together without proper introduction. So, plan ahead to display them in the right order so they get along!

name: DarkSpar
description: DarkSpar is an idle / Incremental game in a retro 8-bit RPG style. Train champions in 63 skills across 3 skill trees to master godlike powers. Explore the post- apocalyptic continent of DarkSpar to find hidden artifacts and to fight ancient evils.

name: A List of People Who Went Missing in the Scheleirland National Forest
description: A horror visual novel. This is the story of a woman who tried to avoid a terrible fate.

name: Loading Zone
description: The Loading zone is a puzzle game, in which you will by tasked to load up different cars with boxes of different shapes and sizes.

name: SnakeByte
description: Snakebyte is a fast-pace snake-like arcade game that will bring back couch-based multiplayer and make your friends scream 'Byte Me!'. Plenty of bits for every snake.... or are there?

name: Hypermind
description: Hypermind is a first-person puzzle game inspired by Portal. As a tester, you have been given four powerful abilities, and you will need to solve a series of interesting puzzles with combinations of these abilities and a touch of imagination.

name: World of Retailing
description: It is your mission to open a new store in that town, but wait... are you gonna create a monopoly? Don't you dare! Okay, we understand, it is your fate. Go ahead.

name: Cute Snake
description: Help the cute snake to cross the maze. Relax and enjoy this cute and minimalist experience.

name: Number Wars
description: You will not believe doing math can be so fun. Looking for some fun and thrill while doing math?

name: Moto Mouse Stunt Mania
description: Moto Mouse Mania is a fun adventure and action racing game with cute little mouse with different bikes and nice animation. Not all Mice should be hated and after all this one is a cute and loveable.

name: Never out of Time
description: Survive in an ocean of bullets by dodging, shooting at your foes and manipulating time. You can take as much time as you need and even "do over": You set the tempo of the action. Will you be able to conquer the space station?

name: Story of You: The Allied Kingdoms
description: Story of You: The Allied Kingdoms is a game about choices and consequences. See your character change according to the ways of life you choose, through a journey of discovery.

name: Mirror Shoot
description: In Aranet, space is connected through mirrors. You are an agent in Aranet and you need to learn the physics in this planet and fight for resources.

name: Jack Saves Easter
description: Jack Saves Easter is a family friendly game where you play as Jack the Rabbit. Use your skills and wits to help Jack recover various Essence Shards that will restore The Ancient Tree Eggdrasyl. Solve puzzles and clues that will help you save Easter for All !

name: Legacy of Aeroja
description: Legacy of Aeroja is a Fantasy Action Rpg made in RPG Maker MV. It follows Aeroja as they go from newborn drake to full sized dragon, dealing with the loss of their parent and the harsh winter and people around them. A tale of excess awaits.

name: Sprout Lands
description: Sprout lands - Explore the green expanses of a fairy tale world in this platform game with the main character trying to harvest his crops from the beds that have been stolen!

name: The Red Hood
description: Game is about little lost girl, who tries to find right path to visit her grandmother

name: Battle of Finland: Winter War
description: Battle of Finland: Winter War is a 2D side-scrolling action platformer. The Soviet Union began the conquest of Finland on November 30 1939, thus the Winter War was started. Can you help small Finland stop the red army steam rolling over Finland?

name: BangBang PewPew
description: Finally, modern lightguns have become available for the PC that bring back the classic feeling of aiming down the sights. It’s time for the games to catch up! 25 lightgun challenges. Hot-seat multiplayer. Online challenges and leaderboards. Customizable targets.

name: AirFighter
description: Air Fighter is a free 3D game in which you can fly your personal plane from World War II and take part in air battles against other planes.

name: Colors! Maze
description: Colors! Maze is a minimalist casual game of easy mazes with relaxing music.

name: Kickrexing
description: Kickrexing brings you the most exhilarating, no holds barred t-rex free kickboxing experience ever seen in the history of rexkind. Featuring ultra-realistic mocap from real t-rex champions with amazing graphics built to grantee that you’ll be sure to feel every kick, punch and tail swing.

name: Problem Animals
description: Problem Animals is a top down view game that is not easy to navigate, and at the same time very beautiful. You will have to play the role of the Hedgehog who is trying to steal mushrooms from hares.

name: Locotier
description: Locotier is a fully moddable Czech train game in which you can complete missions, try out trains from different time epoch, or just ride.

name: NoRoY
description: A dark adventure full of tense moments that will test your skills. Your main goal is to climb to the top while avoiding difficult obstacles and disturbing creatures. NoRoY is very agile, but a single mistake can cause you to lose all your progress.

name: Wolf Riot
description: Survive the night. Play as Frank the Werewolf for a wave based cage fight for survival. Tear through a convenience store to fend off a mechanized infantry platoon of mercenaries.

name: Roof Genocide
description: Could you dare to slash through your way in a space era with our mighty warrior Zila! Ease your mind with our nostalgic athmosphere while fighting against dreadful robots.

name: Havsala: Into the Soul Palace
description: Havsala is an investigative puzzle game with a rich storytelling in which you try to pinpoint times and places where the Soul Palace visitors live using diaries, books, paintings and many other clues.

name: Bad Guy: Neighborhood
description: Roam a violent neighborhood as you complete various objectives to unlock a large variety of unique weapons and abilities. Encounter bosses, partake in mini-games, complete tasks to earn money or cause terror to the neighborhood people in this open world third person game.

name: Funny Card
description: Funny Card is a matchmaking game. Immerse yourself in a relaxing yet intellectually entertaining game. When picking up a pair, do not forget about the time, it is limited.

name: Xio: Survival
description: Xio Survival is an open-world sandbox experience. Survive solo or enter the multiplayer-verse that is vast in size with various biomes to explore. Craft, loot, build and trade your way to riches, however, don't get too comfortable, it can be taken from you quickly.

name: Handball Manager 2022
description: The new Handball Manager 2022 DLC gives you access to the current squad lists of the season 21/22, promotions and relegations, new player images, new sponsors and many other optimizations.

name: Destruction of Planets
description: Destruction of Planets is a 2D mix of arkanoid and bullet-hell genres. The main goal is to destroy all balls in form of planets with different properties.

name: SpaceBlocc
description: Build your ship, go through obstacles and build an even bigger ship!

name: Snail Story: Love Edition
description: Snail Story: Love Edition is a dating sim that is choice-driven and with multiple good and bad endings. There will be a mystery element involved, which shadows a predominantly romantic storyline.

name: Murder by Moonlight 2: Crimson Night
description: Strange murders have shaken the city, the work of a twisted killer who only comes out at night and leaves his victims drained of blood. Help Detective Elliot in this thrilling Match3 Crime Story to solve the mysterious case.

name: Super Ick
description: A cartoony mix of peaceful fishing and chaotic bullet hell action, with dozens of fish to collect and over twenty planets to discover! Explore a densely packed galaxy filled to the brim with charming characters and alien landscapes, and work your way toward uncovering Super Ick's dark truth.

name: Existential
description: Existential is a first-person story-driven puzzle game that offers a unique solution that will put your existence into the game world.

name: The BuildSphere: Rise of the Anomalbots
description: The BuildSphere: Rise of the Anomalbots is a cyber-cool and retro style, sci-fi scavenger hunt and puzzle solving game with platforming and obstacle course like levels. Each progressive level will challenge you to collect assets and craft your next piece of loot in order to progress in the game.

name: Andy's Apple Farm: Christmas Special
description: Celebrate the Holiday Season with Andy the Apple and his Friends!

name: DayDream Mosaics 2: Juliette's Tale
description: Join Juliette on an epic mosaic puzzle quest! Solve spot the difference and hidden object minigames, gather crystals and restore the sanctuaries of tranquility.

name: Future Tanks Area
description: 3D third-person shooter game. Control a tank using a keyboard and mouse. Go through various maps and destroy bots on your way. Fight with two main bosses on your path to complete the game.

name: Lust for Darkness VR
description: Enter the Yelvertons’ Victorian mansion and discover the perverse reality of Lusst’ghaa - now in Virtual Reality! Inspired by the works of Lovecraft and Zdzisław Beksiński, this psychological horror guides you through an intriguing plot filled with erotic and occult themes.

name: Door 3: Insignia
description: Symbols have never had such an impact on a person’s fate. Meet a new part of a fascinating mystical doors puzzle. This time you will have to face the ruins of the past, hiding the secret of a vanished civilization.

name: Alone
description: An open world survival crafting game based more on realism. Craft, hunt, farm, build, and more to come.

name: Epicentrum: Hunt. Stream. Invade.
description: Hunt! Stream! Invasion! Become an elite Hunter and stop the Invasion of the World Eaters. Or join their collective intelligence and devour the universe. Turn-based battles and generated battles! Be in Epicentrum!

name: The Soul Stone War 2: Web of Shadows
description: Take a closer look at the motivations and politics of the major players in Cridevar! Learn more about your companions' pasts and Manerkol's Court.

name: Unlimited World Book: Retro
description: Unlimited World Book: Retro is a single-player story game about the origin story of the character Doctor Edward Retro from Unlimited World 1.

name: Escape Sand Dunes
description: This is a first-person shooter game,the player is surrounded by zombies，The player is free to explore the surrounding area, dodge zombies or kill them, The player needs to survive as long as possible.

name: Neon Horizon: Eclipse
description: Neon Horizon: Eclipse is a first-person action platformer in which you have to go on an exciting adventure across eight different islands. Each island has its own unique traps and obstacles.

name: Red Ops Arcade
description: Red Ops Arcade is a survival and fighting game that takes place across different worlds. The player has to fight zombies, monsters, ghosts and many other enemies, using different weapons that he will find in mystery boxes. The player must reach the highest round possible, but be careful because as higher is the level, more difficult will be to finish it.

name: Runnyk
description: A 2D mini action RPG game about a viking and magic rune powers.

name: A Rat's Life: The Cat Conspiracy
description: Play as a rat in this first-person action-adventure. Overcome enemies and obstacle with your rat skills. Sneak and run away from horrifying cats. Ultimately explore and meet different rats to confirm or debunk conspiracy theories in this story-rich world.

name: Alternate Universe
description: Welcome to The Alternate Universe. An action, adventure, strategy, and a simulation game.

name: Dead by Daylight: Portrait of a Murder Chapter
description: The latest chapter for Dead by Daylight includes a new Killer – The Artist – and a new Survivor, Jonah Vasquez. A new Realm, the surreal Forsaken Boneyard, will be opened for all players. Purchasing this add-on also unlocks an exclusive cosmetic for Jonah: The Crimson Shirt.

name: The Dark
description: Single player and online multiplayer survival game set in a post-apocalyptic open world, with an open world dungeon system.

name: Alma
description: Alma is an interactive narrative that captures the tension of work-life balance for healthcare workers. Play as Alma, a caring mother and pediatric nurse, who must tend to both aspects of her life. Alma is a story of self-care and the struggle to find balance in an imbalanced life.

name: Tumble
description: Tumble is a 2D indie action-platformer set in a dangerous world where humanity is forced to live underground. Fight countless enemies and bosses, uncover a deep storyline and rescue those you value most... if you can make it all the way down.

name: Worldle
description:
Guess the Worldle in 6 guesses.
Each guess must be a valid country, territory, ...
After each guess, you will have the distance, the direction and the proximity from your guess and the target country.

name: Heardle
description:
A respectful homage to Wordle, with a musical twist.
Listen to the intro, then find the correct artist & title in the list.
Skipped or incorrect attempts unlock more of the intro.
Answer in as few tries as possible and share your score!

In July 2022 it was announced Spotify had acquired Heardle.

name: Tusmo
description: Tusmo is a word-game like Wordle but using the french TV show Motus rules. You can play it with your friends or by yourself.

name: Qrabbles
description:
Qrabbles is a physics based sandbox game where you can build your own worlds, and play in them as a sticky creature.
The game is a building game, where you can build giant parkour maps, or create tornados with fans, giant escape rooms, but what you biild is up to your imagination.

name: The Ascent: Cyber Edition
description:
The Ascent is a solo and co-op action RPG set in a cyberpunk world. The mega corporation that owns you and everyone, The Ascent Group, has just collapsed. Confusion and chaos ensue, security and order are in disarray, and without protection, everyone is left to fend for themselves. Stop gangs and hostile corporations from taking over and discover what really happened.

The Ascent: Cyber Edition includes:
- Base Game
- Steelbook
- 88 Pages Artbook
- Tuck-in Box

name: Blazing Strike
description: Inspired by classic arcade fighting game series from industry greats such as Capcom and SNK, the upcoming 2D fighting game from developer RareBreed Makes Games is Blazing Strike evokes the excitement and nostalgia of 2D pixel art genre pioneers while incorporating a unique games system with modern mechanics.

name: Blazing Strike: Limited Edition
description:
Limited Edition includes:
- The Game
- Full color 112 pg art book with @absolum illustrations
- CD Soundtrack w/ original illustration cover
- Set of 14 collectible character cards

name: Endzone: A World Apart - Survivor Edition
description: Endzone is a post-apocalyptic survival city builder, where you start a new civilization with a group of people after a global nuclear disaster. Build them a new home and ensure their survival in a shattered world, threatened by constant radiation, toxic rain, sandstorms, droughts, and raiders.

name: Horgihugh and Friends
description: Shoot down 16-bit bad guys in Horgihugh and Friends! At the end of a brutal war, countries decided to dismantle their weapons. When the Gozareans attack, two retired pilots realize their trusty vintage fighter planes are the only means of combating the a…

name: Paradigm Paradox
description:
A superhero anime adventure with gender-bending romance!

Hero or Villain? Your choices determine the heroine’s side. But be careful, things are not always black and white...

Fight monsters and win love with eight different characters for you to grow closer to.

name: Lover Pretend
description: Lights, camera, action! A hilarious comedy about the entertainment industry and the colorful characters that populate it.

name: Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts 2: Elite Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: F1 Manager 2022
description: Make your mark on Formula 1 in the officially licensed F1 Manager 2022. Choose your team and be the boss with the full 2022 roster of staff and drivers. Featuring full F1 licensing and true-to-life presentation.

name: Panel de Pon GB Restoration
description: Panel de Pon GB Restoration is a ROMhack/mod of Pokémon Puzzle Challenge which intends to restore the game to its original concept of being a game in the Panel de Pon series.

name: Party Bots
description: Party Bots is an online party game for up to 100 players. Survive on your platform in a chaotic arena and be the last bot standing!

name: Gran Prix Turbotalina
description:
Gran Prix Turbotalina it's an endless runner video game where Terbutalina (galician music band) are the drivers of wood karts downfields, as in Esteiro local festivity.

Dribble, get down, jump, throw guitars, pick up "filloas"... While descending the road you are going to face some handicaps and barriers.

Explore the main map to find every easter egg. Save "filloas" to afford all the items and kart's designs, from the Classic to The Homer.

name: Rock Garden Deluxe
description: Play through over 100 levels in this stone-matching puzzler, each with its own unique layout, environment, and collectible stone. Two game modes are available: the Classic Game and Random Mode offering endless play.

name: TCG World Metaverse
description: TCG World is an online open world virtual gaming experience where players can earn TCG Coin 2.0, gather NFT collectibles, own virtual real estate, create, explore the game world, control their own online businesses, or just have fun. TCG World introduces a new approach to NFTs making it more than just a piece of art — now players can take their NFTs into the gaming world and play. Everything a player owns in the metaverse is an NFT — real estate, vehicles, pets, trophies and even player avatars.

name: Midnight at Forest
description: Midnight at Forest is a single-player horror game created by 2 indie developers, you need to collect 5 keys in order to unlock the gate and survive. There is a large map, creepy vibes, and a few other things that you need to find out.

name: Whiteboyz Wit Attitude: The Pursuit of Money
description: First there was the Whip/Nae Nae, now it’s time to Wear The Purp with the greatest rappers of all time*! Dance along with the Whiteboyz Wit Attitude in an epic FMV rhythm game, and celebrate the launch of their new album The Pursuit of Money.

name: Whispered Secrets: Tying the Knot - Collector's Edition
description: A typical carriage ride quickly takes a shocking turn when you encounter a cloaked criminal attacking a bride at the Osmont estate!

name: Sex Diary: A Slutty Anniversary
description: An explicit Click-Through VISUAL NOVEL about a newlywed couple sharing a very special first anniversary gift – her ex-girlfriend, Mindy.

name: Star Salvager
description:
A neo retro / roguelike / action-puzzler

Salvage your way through a sea of space junk and take on the alien horde with the ultimate custom-fitted fighting drone!

Cabinet-style arcade combat mixed with fast-paced combo-making.

name: Alternative Punishment
description: As a result of a petty crime, the protagonist of this adult visual novel, is sentenced to serve a week in a military camp. The situation seems dramatic, but something very peculiar changes everything: in the military camp there are only female soldiers.

name: Survive 4 Pleasure
description: A zombie shooter survival game with unique rewarding pleasure features.

name: Trick Shot Ping Pong
description: This game is a physics based trick shot game. Improve your trick shot skills. It's a really difficult game.

name: Fall In Love 1
description: "FALL IN LOVE1" is a casual relaxation game made by "Origin team". Whether it is a beautiful girl illustration or a simple gameplay, it will bring you a relaxed and pleasant experience!

name: Fall In love 2
description: Created by "Origin team", "FALL IN LOVE2" is a very classic game of finding the differences, coupled with beautiful pictures and beautiful girls with unique characteristics, it will definitely bring you a very exciting experience!

name: Little Obedient Robot
description: Take control of a little obedient robot that you program with cards you find. Learn new cards to outmaneuver your enemies. This is our experimental strategy/2D side-scrolling hybrid.

name: Shale Hill Secrets
description: In this story-focused adult visual novel by Love-Joint, you suddenly gain the power to peer into people’s hidden lives. Seduce your classmates in beautiful rendered 3D art. Unravel a conspiracy, fall in love, or use your power for yourself.

name: Invaders from another dimension
description: An action VR Game

name: Fritz 18: Steam Edition
description: At the turn of the century, Fritz fascinated the chess world with victories over Garry Kasparov and then-reigning World Champion Vladimir Kramnik. The "most popular chess program" offers you everything you will need as a dedicated chess enthusiast.

name: Ten Trials of Babel: The Doppelganger Maze
description: Otome × Battle Royale × Mild Horror Multiple Endings Puzzle Game

name: Building Destruction
description: Building destruction - an exciting physical game aimed at destroying buildings and various structures.

name: Symptom of Love
description: Plunge into this story and see what happens!

name: Paquerette Down the Bunburrows
description: Pâquerette Down the Bunburrows is a pathfinding-based bunny-catching puzzle game. The bunnies flee when Pâquerette gets too close: they dash through tunnels carefully avoiding dead ends. Will you let the lil buns outsmart you? Each level is carefully crafted to teach you new, surprising and tricky ways of catching bunnies~

name: Era Dream Chapter: I
description: What if strange dreams come true?

name: Bullion: The Curse of the Cut-Throat Cattle
description: A frantic brawler for 1-4 players with a cast of bovine buccaneers and a unique blend of PvP and co-op gameplay: grab the most loot and stab your friends.... but be sure to keep at least one crewmate alive as you battle to become the sole survivor of the Curse of the Cut-Throat Cattle!

name: Crystal Road: Vale of Memories
description: Embark on a mystical adventure to solve the mystery of the Crystal Road. Guided by a strange voice, you find yourself in a world that has been ravaged by an all consuming fog. Romance will bloom as you establish the land and unravel the truth. Farm, fish and build your forever home in your new life!

name: Hua Mulan: A Chinese Learning Adventure
description: Travel back in time to help defend Hua Mulan against evil time bandits all while learning Chinese in this story-driven, role-playing, open 3D world episodic adventure.

name: Sight and Sound Town
description: Explore the town and Chat with palsTake on rhythm based challenges from the bizarre Clay CreaturesComplete these challenges to unlock MusicRetake challenges that you’ve beaten

name: Fix it: The Handyman Simulator
description: With Fix it - The Renovation Simulator, the player experiences the profession of a craftsman in all its facets. Whether electrical work, installation, gardening or renovation - all fields of activity are covered.

name: Elon
description: After a mysterious accident you are left are stranded, floating through space on a piece of a space station. Craft supplies and Hubs to expand what is now your home. But be warned space is a dangerous places where one mistake can mean certain death. Can you defy the odds and survive in space?

name: RoguePG
description: RoguePG is a strategic rogue-lite game with turn-based elements. Each run features a new band of heroes, each with unique actions and powerful skills. Upgrade your actions, find new skills, and discover game-altering baubles in your quest to conquer three floors of enemies.

name: Voxquest: The Firebird
description: An open world fantasy adventure in a voxel art style! Explore a massive, continuous overworld with puzzles, upgrades, a variety of weapon aspects and six dungeons. Play with keyboard or XBOX-style controller.

name: Space Attack
description: Space Attack is a retro shooter with a 1970s feel. You can upgrade your ship according to your preference. Enemy battles show physics-based behavior. The difficulty level is set low for those who are not familiar with the game.

name: Pizza Delivery 3000
description: Leap into your hovercraft, fire up the laser cannons, and prepare for the ultimate game of 31st century cat-and-mouse. Strap in tight - you play a delivery driver in a town where pizza has been outlawed. Delivering pizza has never been so dangerous!

name: ModBots
description: ModBots is a third-person arena rogue-like in which players play as robots fighting through randomized arena layouts against hordes of grunt robots and larger gladiators. As the players advance, they gain upgrades and weapons to enhance their abilities to fight and survive in the everchanging arena!

name: Lights, Camera, Reaction!: IRL Edition
description: Compete in both 2D and 3D mini-games against 3-8 players with this couch-style party game! Experience the fun of all your favorite timeless party games together! Your phone (or tablet) is your controller. Draw and act out words, battle in retro side-scrollers, cock block friends, and more!

name: Spirits of Freedom
description: Embark on this Epic Platform-Style Adventure, Inspired by the Most Iconic Games Ever. Race with WOLFY, and Fly with FOXY on a journey to save your home with the help of the Rainbow Spirits and their friends.

name: Whale
description: The most historically inaccurate whale hunting simulator on market! Grab your friends, grab harpoons, and a boat, and sail off into the 2D ocean to find whales and take them down.

name: World Seed
description: A simple game with big ambitions. Fight creatures, explore the world and progress your character in this ever changing world.

name: Monster Island
description: Destroy all the monsters and save the island!

name: Smugglers of Cygnus
description: Smugglers of Cygnus places you in command of a ship in the service of that noblest profession: Commerce. Travel the galaxy. Deliver goods. Deliver goods of questionable legality for higher rates. Fend off pirates, or perhaps become one yourself...The Galaxy is yours. Come and take it.

name: Lake Facade: Director's Cut
description: Explore, Fish and discover the mysteries hidden within Lake Facade. A short narrative puzzle/adventure game with multiple endings and secrets to find.

name: Sukebe Blocks
description: A fast-paced BRAKOUT game reminiscent of the old Internet FLASH games (DATSUI BLOCK-KUZUSHI). Can be played with mouse only.

name: My Train Arrives: In ten years
description: Take a look at your favorite cities in ten years. 8 cities from the original campaign will be available in this extension. The game area increased by 65%. New passenger and cargo stations appeared in all cities.

name: Boomer Slayers
description: Boomer Slayers is an old-school top-down shooter with modern low-poly graphics and badass gameplay. Join friends in local co-op to slay enemies together!

name: EEP 17
description: Anniversary edition: For the 30th anniversary of TREND Verlag, discover the new version of the most innovative, complete and reliable railway simulation.

name: EDM Storm: Match 3 VR
description: Exciting match-3 puzzle game, with electronic music for climax！

name: Countryball: Europe 1890
description: Discover the 19th and 20th centuries with countryballs!

name: Lambda end Theory
description: Lambda end Theory is a cryptic and minimalist RPG about a mysterious world and its inhabitants.

name: Carrier Battles 4 Guadalcanal: Submarines & Torpedo Alley Scenario
description: Play with submarines and enjoy a new scenario.

name: Rebel
description: REBEL - is a 3D shooter with surviving elements where you will have to fight with a prison rebel.

name: Trigger
description: Trigger is a 3d side-scrolling, photorealistic, adventure game that lets you take control of a young ball named Neo. Since you were gifted with special abilities, you will be tested on whether you're good enough to be sent on real missions.

name: Cube
description: Cube is a puzzle/platform minimalistic game with a rotation mechanic, your logical thinking, dexterity and precision will be challenged, try to get the best score while pass through 49 levels with progressive dificulty. It can be harder than it looks.

name: A2 Zygon
description: A bullet hell shoot-em-up that will truly challenge your skills. Gameplay oriented, retro themed, and with a spine-tingling soundtrack.

name: DuckHunt: Missouri Kidz
description: Don't get fooled by the simple looks of this game! The way it is played is something unseen so far in the gaming world! Using a novel patented technology you and your friends will use your cellphones to aim at the screen and shoot! Show your friends who is a real gunslinger!

name: Mystery Solitaire: Powerful Alchemist 2
description: Return to the Middle Ages and become a powerful alchemist! This is a new sequel to the beloved game.

name: Vacation Adventures: Park Ranger 9
description: A Sensational Vacation Helping to Run TWO National Parks Spend a sensational Summer helping the Rangers run Pinecreek Hills & Buffalo Valley National Parks.

name: The Chronicles of Hercules II: Wrath of Kronos
description: The Titan Kronos has broken free from Tartarus and raised an army of giants to attack Olympus and defeat the gods! Help Hercules in the second part of the epic Match3 game defeat Kronos and save the Olympus!

name: Hollowsk 1999 3D
description: This town is full of familiar people whose faces cannot be remembered. Full of familiar streets and yards that never end. But you look like you’ve been here before - you do look familiar. Join the howling monoliths drowning in the haze, uncover their mysteries in a slow-burn retro horror adventure.

name: Deflector: Specimen One
description: Deflector: Specimen One is a high-octane bullet hell roguelite set in a deadly world. Upgrade your character with the DNA you find, evolve him further during your runs and explore the farthest reaches of this microcosm… or die trying.

name: Real Tennis
description: You can freely enjoy tennis anywhere through VR. Get trophies based on the Winning Points you get for every win. Practice swing at the training ground, compete with bots, and raise your ranking score with pvp competitions with friends!

name: D.O.A
description: DOA is a 3person Shooter with Multiplayer Modes ..

name: Hidden Floating City Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: KeyWe: The 100th Grand Ol' Telepost Tournament
description: Postal pros Jeff and Debra have proven themselves indispensable members of the Telepost workforce, and now they’re looking to ascend to the rank of Postmasters! But first, they must conquer the annual Telepost Tournament! Do you have what it takes to tackle this Bungalow Basin tradition?

name: The Pointless Car Chase: Refueled
description: You're being chased... clearly; For what reason? none; Now it's up to you to outrun your pursuers. Drive and customize over 20 vehicles, and try to escape; It's a dangerous task, maybe you can succeed.

name: Mystery Solitaire: The Black Raven 2
description: A continuation of the solitaire game based on the famous mystical poem "The Raven" by Edgar Allan Poe.

name: Aladdin: Save the Princess
description: Come and save the princess in this game with exciting new levels! Simple to control!! You can play with one hand very fast. Luckily Princess's friend has found you for this job. Good Luck! Let God be with you!

name: The Sinking Structure, Clione, and Lost Child: Log-2
description: Two silent wanderers,6 full chapters,A game of exploration and adventure.

name: Blade & Sword
description: This game is an action role-playing game, in which players will be in the ancient time of more than 3000 years ago and use their swords to fight against the spirit of the Emperor Jo of Country Jo who is trying to annex the world.

name: Elf World Adventure: Part 1
description: You are gamer who likes to play computer games. One day, returning home from the store, along the way you became a victim of an accident. At the last moment you think that your story is over, but some force has given you a second chance in another world that is completely different from yours.

name: PSA: Peepy Saving Adventure!
description: This PSA was made to educate all good children on the etiquette of school life, and the dangers lurking in every place of learning. Face pedagogy, eat tasty snacks, and join Cowboy Peepy, Ungacopter, and Leglet as they venture to rescue Ema from the dark depths of School!

name: Einherjar
description: Einherjar is a combination RTS and turn-based game, with roguelike elements. Defend against waves of enemies as your territory expands, and the opposition becomes tougher, while building up your base and defending and upgrading your resources.

name: Monster Girl Invasion
description: Monster Girl Invasion is a JRPG style Adult game featuring monster girls. During your adventure you will get into battles with monster girls where they will either try to KO you or seduce you, if you lose they violate you, if you win, you may be able to convince them to join you.

name: One Step After Fall
description: Immerse yourself in the depressing thoughts of Steve Robinson, learn his story and face your fate in this incredible narrative experience.

name: Hidden Objects: Tranquil Valley
description: Immerse yourself in the peaceful environment of Tranquil Valley. Find objects without pressure in Zen mode or put your sleuthing skills to the test in Time Attack mode.

name: MASD
description: MASD is a unique shooter/survival project. Once you have landed on the island, many challenges await you. Craft equipment, build your shelter and destroy your competitors. The availability of resources is strictly limited!

name: Surface: Strings of Fate - Collector's Edition
description: Can you save your sister from a sinister game?

name: Might of the Stones
description: The world is in danger. An evil entity is trying to destroy the world. It is your job to stop this evil being! Do you have what is takes to save the planet?

name: Run Girls Run
description: Run, girls! Run!

name: Walkabout Mini Golf: Sweetopia
description: Discover a fantastical world of decadence where you can frolic in a sugary fantasyland of confectionery favorites. Putt your way through gooey, colorful, and mouth watering obstacles across 36 holes in Macaroon Meadows, the Mallow Marsh, the Garden of Gummi Delights, Hard Candy Mountains, and more!

name: Dandy & Randy DX
description: Play either alone or with a friend on this cute adventure game!

name: Holdfast: Frontlines WW1
description: Holdfast: Frontlines is an online multiplayer first and third-person shooter set during WW1. Engage in large-scale and destructive battles of The Great War with over 150 players per server, featuring rifles, machine guns, artillery, grenades, and other iconic weaponry and mechanics from the time.

name: Lost Ember: VR Edition
description: Explore the remains of a fallen world from fascinating perspectives! Slip into the role of different animals to uncover the fate of an ancient world. Dive into deep waters, fly at lofty heights, dig underground as a mole, climb steep cliffs with a mountain goat, and many more!

name: Black Book: Endless Battles
description: Battle against Cherdyn’s most fearsome foes on a journey into the very mouth of Hell! Level your character, try different tactics, and test your mettle in combat in Black Book’s new rogue-like mode, the Endless Battles.

name: Kaze no Noriko: Sanae-san no Yokai Taiji
description: Aerial action with lots of jumping! Take control of Sanae and try to get through the five stages!

name: Deadburg
description: Deadburg is a co-op survival game set in a procedurally generated city with thousands of buildings to explore and zombies to kill. Every building you see can be explored, exploited and destroyed one block at a time. Play alone or with friends and discover the secrets of the city.

name: Cast
description: Applauding, the cast is ready. Lighting, the shadow is sneaky. Tabing, the final is blurry. Ending, the future is dizzy.

name: Super Runner VR
description: SUPER RUNNER is a virtual reality game where you have to complete hard challenges interact with a variety of tools , weapons vehicle and objects to complete the challenges

name: Dr. Science quest
description: Dr. Science quest - Even the most brilliant scientists need rest. But bad luck, you got into a nightmare of the protagonist, where all the computers from his laboratory were scattered across the distant corners of consciousness. Collect all the equipment in this unusual platformer, otherwise be in trouble!

name: Sky Jump
description: A journey to find something hidden in the sky on a small light aircraft. Wear VR and stand in place and enjoy adventures. There's no radical movement, and I try to play while savoring what I see.

name: Terranova
description: A nostalgic interactive fiction game set in the early 2000's. Chat with your friends, update your LimeJournal, and discover yourself through a rich world of storytelling, love and friendship.

name: Iron Guard
description: A sci-fi Tower Defense game. Strategize to destroy waves of rogue robots and assist the powerful turrets with player controlled drone. Build and collect resources and help evacuate your crew from the alien planet.

name: Tank Hangar Simulator
description: Tank Hangar Simulator, In Your Own Hangar You Can Both Repair Tanks and Build Your Own Tank and Join the War!

name: Liu Yi's strange world adventure
description: An adventure decryption type of game It mainly triggers the decryption level through the plot mode. In order to save the mainland, you embark on an unknown adventure, look for the mysterious badge of light, and get the power of the great magician!

name: Imha
description: IMHA is an action horror FPS set on a mysterious island ravaged by a demon invasion.

name: Swords and Their Boy
description: Swords and Their Boy is a 2.5D sci-fi souls-like action about two AI swords using a mortally wounded boy to finish their task - cleanse an alien planet before its colonization.

name: Perfect Balance Collection
description: Stack and balance blocks, don't let them fall off the screen. 380 levels! Can you solve all the puzzles? Contains all five classic Perfect Balance games.

name: Radical Roach: Infinity
description: A Uniquely Radicalized Adventure Every Flight!

name: Rhentsu
description: Embark on this adventure in search of a mysterious galactic artifact, full of action and sensual women. Fight different bosses and find out what can happen if this artifact falls into the wrong hands.

name: Legendary Sword
description: This is the first person medieval RPG game, where you can experience the open world. Become a farmer, breed livestock, go out hunting in the sun, sneak into the castle at night as a thief, or bring your best weapons and armor to resist the invasion of the enemy. Finally, take the booty home.

name: Roll For Initiative
description: Roll for Initiative is a virtual translation of modern tabletop gaming, intended to be an introduction to the system for new players and a chance for experienced players to play tabletop games on their own.

name: Monkey Mansion
description: Monkey Mansion is a high-paced online co-op horror game for 1-4 players. Your mission is to obtain the priceless relics hidden inside a lavish 1920's Russian mansion. Recover them all without getting caught by the old pet proboscis monkey that was affected by the maniacal rituals performed there.

name: BlackJack and Waifus
description: You've got a BlackJack and Waifus here! Could you ask for more? Relaxing Music, Charming Girls to play with... And lots of Fun times!

name: Phonetic
description: Phonetic is a casual brain teaser game. A simple game in which the player deciphers the phonetic spelling of various words. Try it out and see what highscore you can set!

name: Syrak: the War in the Middle-East
description: SYRAK is a card-based strategy game set during the most complex war in recent history of the Middle-East. Local or Online game have you play as the Resistance Axis or the Western Defence Organization. Use powerful Political, Espionage and Military Cards to outwit and overwhelm your opponent.

name: Mystery Solitaire: Grimm's Tales 4
description: Remove the spell of the evil fairy from the sleeping princess and awaken the kingdom from its slumber!

name: Dance Hall Brawl
description: Play as Veta, a gal trying to solve things peacefully in a dangerous world. Work to win the hearts of those in each city, taking a lot of hits without dishing any out! DANCEHALLBRAWL is a game where the most skilled players won't get hit at all!

name: Detectives United: Deadly Debt - Collector's Edition
description: United against evil once again!

name: Train Simulator: Salzburg - Rosenheim Route
description: All aboard for Austria! Take charge of cross-border passenger & freight traffic with RSSLO’s Salzburg - Rosenheim route for Train Simulator.

name: Déjà Vu
description: Déjà Vu is a sci-fi puzzle platformer. The player solves puzzles through the use of clones created from actions they recorded.

name: Idle Monster TD: Evolved
description: An endless Tower Defense game of epic Monsters vs evil Humans. Unlock, upgrade, and evolve over 100 unique Monsters to defend your home from an infinite swarm of increasingly difficult enemies. Strategize the most effective placement of Monsters to optimize their powerful abilities.

name: Firebird
description: Firebird is a narrative road trip taking place in the russian folklore, in an adventure that looks like a traditional tale. Aboard your truck, travel to the far north, meet colorful characters and face the creatures inhabiting these sacred lands.

name: Hidden Tavern Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: The Legend of Pomodoro
description: The Legend of Pomodoro is a pomodoro tool and idle game driven by tomatoes.

name: Mari and Bayu: The Road Home
description: Go on a grand voyage in this co-op platform-adventure game. Play as Mari the ant and Bayu the firefly to solve puzzles, surf the wind on a feather or even ride a friendly grasshopper!

name: Cassiodora
description: Cassiodora is a medieval fantasy game inspired by classic shoot 'em up with unique mechanics and epic boss fights. Save the princess Cassiodora by yourself or with up to 2 friends on the same screen.

name: Chernobyl Trap
description: You are survived pilot of fallen helicopter. Your mission is simple: go to evacuation point. But can you do it and not die?

name: Golden Age
description: Guard the holy city, and at the right time, go deep into the hinterland of the dark legion, and retrieve the holy objects lost in the last temple catastrophe, the book of contract, the holy grail, the holy sword, the holy stone, the magic bottle, the Thor's hammer, etc.

name: Sinisistar: Lite Version
description: A simple 2D action game centered on themes of masochistic tendencies, yearning for death, as well as despair at being attacked by terrifying beings.

name: Milf Toys
description: Hentai is not just 2D girls, this is a whole art. And in this art units understand.

name: The Oregon Trail
description: Experience The Oregon Trail like never before. A modern twist on the trials and tribulations of the road to Oregon, this official successor to the global phenomenon will immerse players in exhilarating journeys ranging from the historically accurate to the totally extreme.

name: Just in Slime
description: A lewd cooking game where you mix potions to make the best slimes!

name: Little Inner Monsters
description: Do you know your Little Inner Monsters? These are the different feelings we deal with on a daily basis. Play with them in this card game and bring your own little monster grove to life. Play against the computer or a friend.

name: Music Racer: Ultimate
description:
Now you can race your own music!

Music Racer is the dynamic rhythm game loved by millions of players around the world.

The new "Ultimate" version allows you to use your own music in the game via a WebDAV server (from a computer or smartphone), as well as play to music published on the Audius service.

name: Royal Frontier
description: The wagons are packed and an eager group of settlers are ready to head out. But the journey is full of dangers. Treacherous terrain, savage bandits and ancient monsters have been the end of many settlers. So they turn to you to protect them. Choose your party, move across the map like a board game, and battle monsters. The combat is a nuanced mix of turn-based and time-based approach, with attacks, specials and items make each encounter unique.

name: Broken Pipe
description:
Help all robots to escape from this world.
Contains several levels, open world to explore, collectibles and mini games

name: Night Light
description: The personifications of Night and Light learn to get along. Discover each other’s unique skills to help both Night and Light come to realize that new paths will open up if they work together.

name: Azerion
description: First / third person multiplayer shooter with single and multiplayer AI bots and monster, premade and procedural environments.

name: Escape the Darkness
description: Escape the darkness is a first person horror game involving a person trying to escape a maze. The game occurs in an hospital with repetitive rooms and involve a character who caries a flashlight that tries to escape by burning the enemy.

name: Again
description: This is done by one Russian developer, the game will be constantly changing in the future, it will have an open world, a store where players will be able to buy many things for game currency, from items that restore health to armor.

name: The Zium Gallery
description:
Zequel to The Zium Garden.
The Zium Gallery is a Museum Exploration Game filled with artwork and installations from artists around the world, working in various mediums and styles.

name: Your Financial Story
description: A No-Nonsense Finance Game about Personal Finance, Money Management, & Budgeting

name: Grandma
description: This is a grandma Jumpscare horror game.

name: Sugar Crime
description: All candies have disappeared in the US because of a Sweets Prohibition. Fortunately, two clever and determined heroes Zack and Lou do not agree! They find candies and distribute them to grateful children everywhere while trying to figure out who is behind this dreadful law. Help Zack and Lou with their investigation before the police can stop them!

name: Rooms: The Toymaker's Mansion
description: Rooms: The Toymaker's Mansion is a unique puzzle game inspired by sliding puzzle and platformer games. In a twisted mansion made of rooms that slide like puzzle pieces, player should find a way to the exit by moving rooms and using what's inside them. As the player explores the mansion, various gadgets are introduced and make the puzzles more tricky and challenging.

name: OrbusVR: Reborn
description:
With more than 100+ hours of unique content and a strong in-game community, Orbus is a VR experience like no other!
Battle monsters, race dragons, brew a potion, or kick back at the Highsteppe Tavern and catch up with your favorite adventurers.

name: Loco Dojo Unleashed
description: Enter the whimsical wooden world of Loco Dojo & step up to Grand Sensei’s 'Table of Trials' to pit your silliest skills against (up to) 3 friends or strangers in this hilariously competitive multiplayer party game

name: Coaster Combat
description: Theme park ride meets action game in Coaster Combat, the most enjoyable roller coaster experience ever! It’s amazingly comfortable yet extremely exhilarating with fun shooting action, endless track combinations and beautiful environments that will keep you coming back for more.

name: Day of the Viking
description: Tap on waves of marauding vikings, commanding your archers to rain pointy death upon them. Or for a bigger punch use the slingshot to send boulders, exploding barrels, and even pigs to fend off their advances. As the days and seasons go by, the vikings get smarter, building shields, slides, and moving war machines to get past your defenses. That’s where you use coins gathered in play to upgrade your fortifications and ammunition. It’s gonna be a heckuva fight.

name: Swords of Anima
description: A new tactical turn-based RPG experience. Command the Savior Rex Squad in an epic journey of courage and deception. Can you break the Curse of the Eclipse?

name: Rogue Knight: Infested Lands
description: Fight or sneak your way through hordes of monsters in an attempt to hunt down the dark wizard Zogorath in this turn-based roguelike. Use magic scrolls, potions and skills to outwit your enemies, but be careful; skills cost stamina and some items are more useful in certain situations than others…

name: Kingsport Festival
description:
The Rituals of Mysteries is the long-awaited official port of the board game by Andrea Chiarvesio and Gianluca Santopietro inspired by the short story "The Festival", one of the milestones of the famous Cthulhu Mythos that made famous the Solitary of Providence, became popular as the Master of Weird.
In the unimaginable darkness of Kingsport, silent wanderers are called to a profane celebration. Their goal: to invoke unthinkable horrors! A dread terror that is not of this world or any other — but rather from the spaces between the stars — demands your submission.

name: Coffee Inc 2
description:
Welcome to The Coffee Inc 2: the next generation of The Coffee Inc, a popular business simulation game in the world.
As a founder and CEO, your role is to start up your coffee shop, manage coffee bean blends, create the best coffee products, hire and motivate the best talents, conduct effective marketing, manage financials, expand the business to multiple cities and build the biggest coffee empire!

name: Cosmic Mechanic
description:
A deep space explorer crash lands on a mysterious planet. To get back home, you must engineer vehicles out of whatever parts you find and traverse the alien portal network left behind by a long gone ancient civilization.
Cosmic Mechanic is an exciting game about building cool gadjets and contraptions to navigate through many mind bending scenarios.
Over 50 levels, 4 unique gameplay modes (puzzle, jump, time, collect) and lots of vehicle parts to experiment with.

name: Zorya: The Celestial Sisters - Stellar Edition
description: In this award-winning cooperative puzzle game, play along with a friend as either Aysu or Solveig and help reunite the sister goddesses. Includes Full Game + Digital Soundtrack (.mp3 and .flac) + Digital copy of The Art of Zorya: The Celestial Sisters.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Chaos Gate - Daemonhunters: Castellan Champion Edition
description: The Castellan Champion Edition includes Warhammer 40,000: Chaos Gate - Daemonhunters, the Original Soundtrack, and the unique playable character Castellan Garran Crowe.

name: Ballista
description: Ballista is a completely immersive fantasy world with stunningly real physics and casual action adventure. In a realm under siege by destruction, tyranny, and even the occasional maleficent dragon, you must progress through five kingdoms to destroy the Bane Stones responsible for corrupting the very brick and mortar of the land’s thirty strongholds, and vanquish the Great Evil for good.

name: Blair Witch: Oculus Quest Edition
description: Blair Witch: Oculus Quest Edition is a story-driven psychological horror game based on the cinematic lore of Blair Witch. As Ellis, a former police officer with a troubled past, join the search for a missing boy in the iconic Black Hills Forest near Burkittsville, Maryland.

name: B-Team
description: The alien invasion is underway! The best and the brightest met the enemy head on, and got their butts kicked for the trouble. Now it is up to you and the members of the B-Team! Dodge to the left. Dodge to the right. Dodge to the left. No, that’s your right. Speed down the path while dodging obstacles and overcoming deadly enemy traps! These aliens are carrying heavy firepower. Use the Team’s special weapons to fight through wave after wave of determined enemies. We are facing an enemy that is truly mentally gifted. Their puzzles and defenses are like nothing you have seen on this planet, unless you have. Put your mind to the test with quick draw challenges! Time to prove you have what it takes to be the the last, 2nd best hope for the planet.

name: Chess Club
description: The greatest strategy game of all times! Select a stunning environment and challenge your friends, our AI, or one of the millions of Chess fans around the world.

name: Sairento VR: Untethered
description: Ever wanted to be a cyber ninja? A top-selling VR game and probably the best cyber ninja simulator ever, Sairento VR offers you that opportunity! Perform quadruple jumps, wall runs, power slides, back flips and even get to manipulate time. Empty lead into an enemy before spinning around to sink your blade into another. Kit yourself with katanas, firearms, bows, throwing glaives, shurikens, kunais and more - they are all at your disposal. Keep growing your experience and upgrading your skills.

name: Mission: ISS
description: Take a trip into orbit and experience life on board the International Space Station! In this Emmy-nominated simulation, learn how to move and work in zero-gravity using your controllers. Dock a space capsule, take a spacewalk, and let real NASA astronauts guide you on the ISS through informative videos and images.

name: Over the Net Beach Volleyball
description:
Over The Net Beach Volley is the arcade video-game of the most played summer game in all the beaches of the world.
You'll be able to take part in enjoyable and frantic tournaments on the most famous beaches, Miami, Barcelona, Dubai, Montecarlo and many others.

name: Forest Golf Planner
description: Create and customize your own golf course in this charming management sim.

name: Willian the Game
description: Willian invites you on an action-packed journey through his entire football career. Experience all of the teams and countries where he’s played, and don’t forget to check out his amazing hairstyles along the way. Mixed with elements of fantasy and humor, this game is designed for all ages, and will entertain you from start to finish. Put your skills to the test as you score goals and ultimately become a football champion!

name: Punch Kidd
description: Punch Kidd lets you re-live your favourite game as a kid, complete with frantic air punches, ghostly enemies and miracle puzzles. Master a world of 16 epic, challenging and diverse levels.

name: Hardboiled
description:
The blast was immense. Humanity finally had destroyed itself. The fallout lasted for weeks after the bombs went off. If you didn’t die in the blast, you died in the coming weeks from radiation and disease. Everyone was fighting for survival in what's left of the abandoned towns and cities. Slowly the survivors are trying to put what's left of their lives back together, some even with force. Just like the other survivors, Max was trying to reclaim his life back. He drove from city to city trying to find a suitable place that was good enough to call home. However, after his latest stop, things got a little complicated starting with a few stolen car parts.
Will Max be able to get the parts back? Will he try his best to help those in need or just mow everyone down in his search. He is ready to become a fist of justice.

name: Turbo Trainz
description:
Turbo Trainz is a fast paced train race which gets your heart thumping and your thumbs pumping!
Take up the challenge and race against the best drivers from around the world to compete for the Turbo Cup! Your opponents are cunning and will stop at nothing to win. Watch they don’t fire a missile up your caboose, make you lose control with an oil spill or bully you off the rails with many other special tactics. You can fight back with many of your own abilities to even up the race!

name: Repulze
description:
Get ready for a futuristic adrenaline rush from the developers of Reckless Racing. Blast through gravity defying tracks while collecting precious energy boosts to push your speed beyond reason!
This futuristic racer puts you in the seat of experimental Repulze hovercraft working as a test pilot for the Man. Well, the Synthetic Man is more accurate. The Synthetics run the corporations.

name: Crystal Cave: Lost Treasures
description:
Crystal Cave: Lost Treasures is a quest for long-lost treasures buried in pitch black caves, pyramids and temples of ancient civilizations. Huge gemstones were sheltered from the sunshine for eons of time waiting for explorers brave enough to unearth them. You - as an intrepid treasure hunter - will need all your ingenuity to pass the traps and dangers of the underground and collect the treasure in more than 100 levels.
Crystal Cave: Lost Treasures offers gameplay mixed of action and puzzle elements for players of all ages!

name: Call of Snakes
description:
Now is the time to show your ability.
Save the armies and make an army force to defeat an enemy forces.
Call Of Snakes is One of the army wars series.
Call Of Snakes is a shooting game combined with the snake-style game rules.
Don't miss out on an brandnew experience.

name: Night Skate
description: Unlock songs, color palettes, and new levels to explore as you skate your way through an endless fantasy mixtape.

name: Another Tomorrow
description:
Another Tomorrow is a puzzle adventure that seamlessly blends intricately rendered dioramas with first person exploration and puzzle solving.
The dioramas provide a superb overview of every scene and the first-person views allow you to climb deep into the gritty world to which you have awoken.
Trapped without your memories but equipped with a camera you’ll explore abandoned apartments, airfields, temples, and underground facilities to search for clues, solve puzzles, and unlock secrets to answer the question; who are you?

name: Golf Dreams
description: Golf Dreams is a free golf simulation game using real physics and groundbreaking controls making it one of the most true golf games out there!

name: PinaPang
description: Sin descripción

name: Clicker Cats: RPG Idle Heroes
description:
Kit just inherited his grandma's tavern and wants to fix it so heroes from all around the world can rest and enjoy some quiet time between epic adventures!
Castle Cats is a relaxing RPG idle game where you send your heroes to quests to find new treasures for your tavern!

name: The Way Home: Dungeon Cat
description:
Trapped on a strange island, Kevin and Cheese struggle to return home.
There are also terrifying monsters and other lost people on the island.

name: Pixel Shooter Infinity
description:
A simple and exhilarating 2D shoot'em up game with minimalistic pixel art style.
Take control of an ever-improving space ship and take down a full of enemies.

name: Ski Bunny
description: Hit the slopes with Ski Bunny! Practice on the intermediate trails, then step up to the Double Diamonds!

name: Macs World
description: Mac's World is a single-player 3D adventure game in which a young pup explores the many floors of a mysterious mansion on a quest to collect as many chicken legs as he can. Traverse 10 unique levels while dodging bombs, solving puzzles, and smacking enemies away with a trusty frying pan. But be careful, as unknown dangers lurk around each corner of the mansion. Is there a haunting afoot? Mac, along with his trusty animal sidekick, will have to face their fears to find out.

name: Runick
description: Runick is a 3D isometric simple, yet challenging puzzle game. The idea is to use rune infused shapes to adequately mark all the tiles on a given board. The shapes the player interacts with adhere to certain geometric principles.

name: Slingshot Effect
description: It's a big universe for a little rocket trying to find a home. Surprises! Danger! Fun! How far you can go before you explode, freeze or get eaten? Listen to great music while you try to beat your own score.

name: Click Your Poison: Infected
description: Part game, part interactive audiobook, this bestselling branching-path story written by James Schannep has been brought to new life by narrator R.C. Bray through the alchemy of Cubus Games. Let this award-winning narrator be your guide through the dark, gritty, and often humorous zombie-infested wasteland. Live, die, and rise again based solely on the merit of your own decisions. But choose wisely, because there's no going back.

name: PureSkate
description:
The long awaited update to one of the first 3D Skate games for iOS is NOW available.
Get ready to skate your heart out in the most realistic and intuitive skateboarding simulation ever made!
Natural fingerboard control combined with a rich 3D view of your skater's
world creates a fun and addictive skateboarding experience that is the first of it's kind.

name: Go Karting Outdoor
description:
Go Karting Outdoor offers an excellent karting experience just as the the original Go Karting game.
Now you will race on various outdoor tracks, inspired by real tracks from around the world.
While playing the game you will get a very realistic go kart experience, with life-like kart handling on fun and challenging tracks.

name: Monster Pow
description: Leverage the power of physics to hit your enemies. Simple to play, hard to master!

name: Perfect Paths
description: Perfect Paths is amazing puzzle solving game where you create paths and add other instructions to move blocks to their designated positions. Blocks can be combined or separated. These simple rules create interesting environment, where each puzzle can be solved in many different ways.

name: CastleOfDuck
description: Evil turtle troops invade a peaceful Ducky planet. Valiant ducky heroes are preparing castle defense against invasion of Turtle troops. Get ready for battle to save Ducky Planet by helping duckies out.

name: Fruit Ninja Academy: Math Master
description: The world-famous fun of Fruit Ninja meets the very best in educational apps in Fruit Ninja Academy: Math Master! Join the Fruit Ninjas in an exciting adventure through jungles, temples and ancient ruins! The curious (and hungry) pig Truffles finds himself in a sticky situation, so Katsuro and his friends must journey to find the Lost Tablets of Fruitasia to rescue him.

name: Susume Tactics
description: Destroy the enemy with your army in this fast paced real-time strategy game!

name: Panthera Frontier
description: Adventure into space with your starship and crew. Discover amazing new alien species to recruit and train, and find powerful weapons to install on your craft. Uncover unique new ships to pilot and command, engaging in tactical combat where you are the commander of your forces! The vast fantasy universe of Panthera Frontier awaits, commander!

name: Moonlight Express: Fortnight
